elem.annotation: Compute the hadron spectrum. This version is a clone of the one above; however, the xml output is written to a separate output file
elem.Name: HADRON_SPECTRUM

Param.annotation: Single Light Flavour, Action piece. Bounds are 0.0007 to 32 Because it is the action/refresh it is a 4th root, and assumes 1 pseudofermion field per flavor.
